item.description:
Weather permitting, Rich  would like to do a group kayak/canoe (bring your lunch).

We put in at union Street bridge on Marshfield/Norwell line about 11:00AM. ride/paddle tide in to BlueBerry island (about 45 minutes/one hour) park on the beach for lunch for 1-2 hours or so while tide turns and ride/paddle tide back to launch area. beautiful river if you have never done; there is a parking area (no permit required).
Anyone interested?

Note: blue berry island can be accessed by foot through the couch cemetery parking lot on Union street (about a half mile hike from parking area).

 

Any questions, email Rich at: runnin_dude@yahoo.com

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Kayak on North River Marshfield and Picnic lunch on the beach
